name: Brokerage/Forex
title: Brokerage/Forex
text: Camitrade Investment provides legal support for licensing of brokerage activities which remains one of our priorities. Different jurisdictions have different naming for the brokerage activities as discussed further in this section. An applicant must satisfy conditions indicated by Our respective regulators.

name: Gaming and Gambling
title: Gaming and Gambling
text: Camitrade Investment provides legal support for licensing of gambling and gaming activities which remains one of our priorities.

name: Insurance
title: Insurance
text: Camitrade Investment has specialized in both offshore and onshore insurance advisory services. Our services cuts across licensing of the different classes of Insurance services such as: captive, reinsurance, portfolio insurance companies, International, and brokers. The need for Insurance security and tax planning has nowadays made offshore insurance services to be lucrative.

name: Banking
title: Banking
text: Camitrade Investment legal expertise understands the relevant prudential requirements and licensing pre-conditions before being granted the respective banking licenses. Jurisdictions may offer different types of banking licenses, such as full banking activities and offshore banking services.

name: Cryptocurrency and Digital Assets
title: Cryptocurrency and Digital Assets
text: Camitrade Investment Fiduciaries dedicated Digital, Blockchain and Fintech team has been established specifically to assist clients operating or investing in businesses in the Fintech sector.

name: Outsourcing Compliance Officers
title: Outsourcing Compliance Officers
text: Offshore companies involved in active trading may utilize a virtual office facility to have more presence in the country where it is registered. A virtual office will enable the company to create and maintain a presence in the jurisdiction without the need to pay rent for an actual space.
